subject: Indianapolis 500 (Auto Race)
Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: After a car crash last fall sent him into early retirement, Dario Franchitti, 40, will stay with Chip Ganassi Racing as an adviser. He will also drive the pace car at the Indy 500 in May.
snippet: After a car crash last fall sent him into early retirement, Dario Franchitti, 40, will stay with Chip Ganassi Racing as an adviser. He will also drive the pace car at the Indy 500 in May.
